title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 30 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 30 2021
description:
Friend of show, conservative author Alex Berenson plans to sue Twitter, which permanently suspended him. Social Media wants to control the flow of information. The left ignores the covid outbreaks in blue lockdown states, such as Hawaii and Oregon. Clay’s high school photo and sports talk. In the California recall election, liberals turn their hate towards Larry Elder. DOJ hires chief diversity officer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
